item.title: El Celulareo
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
[caption id=“attachment_577” align=“alignnone” width=“539” caption=“El Celulareo?”][/caption]

Based on the recent discussion on mobile phones in the milongas. This is the cartoon I mentioned, from B.A. Tango No 198.

"It is astounding Brown. The mobile phone has invaded even the milongas." "Shall we dance, Rosita?" "Yes, José!" "I'll finish my coffee and we'll dance." "I'll be waiting for you, Adriana"

PS: You can subscribe to B.A. Tango by email by sending an email to abatango@yahoo.com with the subject “Suscripción”.
